definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: This is China just trying their new britches on for size.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國只是試一試他們的新褲衩的大小。

sentences.english: Don't let first failure discweage you, try first abundance time.
sentences.chinese: 無所不能因該一次失敗就氣餒，再試一試看。

sentences.english: Let's try it again. Test bubble sort.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們再試一試吧，測試下冒泡排序。

sentences.english: He had followed her into the shrubbery with no idea of trying it.
sentences.chinese: 他跟她走進小樹林時，並沒想到要試一試。

sentences.english: This lake has been fished out, let's try the river.
sentences.chinese: 這湖裏的魚都給捕光了，我們去河裏試一試。

sentences.english: For those who love classic flavours, try the dark chocolates or the "13)alcohol-infused".
sentences.chinese: 喜歡傳統口味的，可以試一試黑巧克力或酒心巧克力。

sentences.english: I read the reviews for Ardell and decided to try it.
sentences.chinese: 我讀了關於愛戴爾睫毛增長液的評論並決定試一試。

sentences.english: So when I found this tea, I was happy to let her try it.
sentences.chinese: 所以當我發現這茶，我很高興讓她試一試。

sentences.english: I said to myself, you let me try, this no-nonsense what.
sentences.chinese: 我心說，你讓我抓了試一試，這不廢話嗎。

sentences.english: Don’t dismiss things out of hand. Be willing to give things a try before discounting them.
sentences.chinese: 不要馬上否決事情，在評價前先試一試。

sentences.english: Hmmm… maybe I need to make that little combo tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我明天要不要來試一試這個組合。

sentences.english: We are anxious that he shall be given a chace to try it out.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱切希望能給他機會試一試。

sentences.english: We have Tomato egg flower soup, It tastes delicious.
sentences.chinese: 您二位可以試一試西紅柿蛋花湯，味道挺不錯的。

sentences.english: Yes, I take the Creamed Spinach Soup. Carrie, do you also want to give it a try?
sentences.chinese: 好，我要奶油菠菜湯。卡莉，你想不想試一試？

definition: to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
